first_para: Sir David Anthony Andrew Amess (born 26 March 1952) is a British Conservative Party politician. He has been a Member of Parliament (MP) since 1983, first for Basildon, and since 1997 for Southend West. He and his wife Julia have one son and four daughters. Their eldest daughter is actress Katie Amess.

full.extract:
Sir David Anthony Andrew Amess (born 26 March 1952) is a British Conservative Party politician. He has been a Member of Parliament (MP) since 1983, first for Basildon, and since 1997 for Southend West. He and his wife Julia have one son and four daughters. Their eldest daughter is actress Katie Amess.
^ "David Amess profile at". TheyWorkforYou.com. Retrieved 5 May 2008. 
^ Kochan, Nicholas (23 October 2000). "How Ann fell out with Michael". New Statesman. Retrieved 5 May 2008.
full.title: David Amess
